title: DurationTypeEnum
description: Specifies the duration type of the Security Lending transaction. e.g. Open or Term.

oneOf.title: Evergreen
oneOf.description: Specifies a trade where the term date is extended by a pre-determined period until a notice is serviced. Once the notice is served, the trade will not be reset again and goes to term.

oneOf.title: Open
oneOf.description: Specifies a trade with no termination date.

oneOf.title: Term
oneOf.description: Specifies a trade with a termination date.
